item.title: A Taste of Istanbul’s Maritime Heritage: My Kumkapı Balık Pazarı Adventure;
item.description: Nestled along the Marmara Sea in the heart of Istanbul, the Kumkapı Balık Pazarı (Kumkapı Fish Market) is more than just a market—it’s a living testament to the city’s deep connection to the sea. For centuries, this vibrant neighborhood has been a hub for fishermen, merchants, and food lovers, offering some of the freshest seafood in the world. As someone who loves exploring culinary traditions, I couldn’t resist visiting this iconic market during my time in Istanbul.

item.title: Review of NDesignStudio's Drawings of the Month of August.
item.description: In this article I will post the drawings I made in the month of august, created by the journalist app. Thank you for your support.
